Posts.Content: Hi Busymom. I start my chemo on new years eve !! Already having sleepless nights about it x
Posts.Title: 2 days into chemo.........

Posts.Content: Hi thanks for your reply, somewhere on this site someone said its a club no one wants to belong too !!  how true, every step has been scary, what started with me being told it would be a lumpectomy, ended up with a bilateral mastectomy with right under arm clearance as it had got into the nodes.. every clinic appointment I was told of another problem, found I started to shake as I walked into the building, there was a point where they were concerned about my liver, all clear now, but a few days of pure panic..Im three weeks post surgery now and coming on well,,just want to get off this ride as im sure everyone does, but as I say to myself every day is a day closer to being well again.. Big Hugs back to you, and thank you again xxxx
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: Hi Busymom, thanks for the reply, I too need 6 rounds, over 18 weeks.Do you know what the connection is between morning sickness and the nausea and sickness during chemo x
Posts.Title: 2 days into chemo.........

Posts.Content: Hi met my oncologist today,very nice but I have this problem of shutting down when so much info is being given !!, Meet with the chemo nurses to check my veins with she says don't look that good,I'm sure they have been retreating since all this started..so that's my Christmas present as that's on the 24th dec and my first round is New Year's Eve !!!! Have to say the whole thing fills me with terror,, Never in a million years did I think any of this would be happening when I found the first lump on the 28 th september !!! Haven't really posted anything on here,although I do log on and read other peoples stories everyday,, and have to say the strength and willpower shown is amazing.
Posts.Title: cemo

Posts.Content: Morning.I had a bilateral mastectomy on November 18th with immediate expander reconstruction. I 've been having the expanders filled with 50mls at a time. I'm now halfway through chemo, with radiotherapy to follow. Next appointment with surgeon in August to book date and take expanders out and replace with implants. Then fingers crossed I can put all this behind me.. it's a hell of a journey as, many of the lovely ladies on here can vouch for !!! Feel free to ask questions if I can be of any help Jane x
Posts.Title: Anyone had double mastectomy with reconstruction ??

Posts.Content: I finished 15 rounds 10 days ago.. My underarm has all.turned to blisters, and now the skin is coming off and the area is raw !!  I'm on holiday in Spain, was given the ok to come away by the hospital, didn't expect such a reaction !! I'm bathing it with antiseptic, and putting dry breathable dressings on.Fingers crossed the worst is over, they did say that things could build up 10 days after the radio had finished.Good look to everyone out there..this journey is so hard, but we will.do it xxxx
Posts.Title: Blisters after Radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi Pat..what part of Spain are you in..we are here on holiday xx
